name: SPACE POLICE STATE X
description:
"SPACE POLICE STATE X" is a Typing-Shmup made for GiantBomb's Giant Rom 3

-------------------

Year X420

After earth was destroyed, cyber-humans beings merged with spacecrafts for survival.

The VAPE FEDERATION sends deadly police starships to obliterate the last focus of the resistance, known as THE LANG ZONE.

Cyber-Humankind has one last hope: The Bomb Squad.

We're all fucked.
